remarks: Full stack senior software developer with many years of experience, working from down the trenches to cutting-edge technologies, building products from scratch to production level.
With a wide range of applications and tools under my belt I've' built professional softwares that had help grown an startup company into a multi-billions enterprise.
If humans were able to crack the secrets of the DNA you'll find the Engineering and Software Development gene on mine.
In my spare time I write code to automate simple task at home from the alarm system to data analytics for my drone flights.
Also love photography and building stuff with my hands.

timeLine.institution: RLDatix (Also known as RLSolutions, Radicalogic and RL)
remarks: Worked on this software company for 21 years. As employee number 7, worn multiple hats to help to grow the company into what it is today.

sred_irap.title: This was an IRAP/SRED project
content: [IRAP](https://nrc.canada.ca/en/support-technology-innovation/about-nrc-industrial-research-assistance-program) and [SRED](https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency/services/scientific-research-experimental-development-tax-incentive-program.html) are programs from the goverment of Canada to insentive research by financially supporting inovating project.
